name: Bullet Chess
description:
A new twist on an age-old game, Bullet Chess is a top-down roguelike shooter where all of the enemies move and attack like chess pieces. Your weapons are also inspired by chess pieces, so everything is intuitive and easy to pick up. Beware though, it gets very hectic very quickly!



Upgrade your weapons as you play to deal with the ever-increasing strength and number of enemies!

Enemies change color as they get stronger so you know which ones to look out for.

After each match, use the pieces you collected to upgrade your arsenal!

Beware the Queens, they can move in all directions!



Destroy the rainbow enemies to get health back to continue the fight!
